channel.title: Help please
channel.description: Ok i need help guys, When ever i attack an NPC i either cant attack it unless im standing right next to it (i dont run to it and attack) or i run in a random direction away from monster, i was told this can be resolved by fixing the walkTo method. If anyone can tell me how to fix it i would be extremly happy

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @alberto2man alberto2man
item.description:
@alberto2man wrote:

walkto packet isnt there and i tried the clicking packet and others but to no success, but are u saying that this problem is client sided and not server?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
